E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/23/1977
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Rich Hand



Date: Thursday, 6/26/1977
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 6/26/1977
Subject: Progress of Dave Geisel
Dear Sir,
Dave Geisel has nothing more to prove at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
He has an ERA of 0.43 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
